title: Miqdad's Portfolio

home.description: I am passionate about creating responsive and visually appealing websites. I specialize in building user-friendly interfaces using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My focus is on delivering seamless user experiences and crafting web designs that adapt beautifully across all devices.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello my name is Miqdad Fauzan Ghozwatulhaq, i'm A Mechatronics and Artificial Intelligence student at Indonesia University of Education with experience in leadership and organizational management. Skilled as an Organization Chairperson and as a staff member in Organizational Development and Student Welfare Advocacy. Proficient in UI/UX design and front-end web development, with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to the creation of innovative and responsive user interfaces. Currently, I am enthusiastic about advancing my career as a Front-End Web Developer in a dynamic professional environment.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Website Maisondesonder
ecommerce.description: Developed a fully functional e-commerce website for fashion products, focusing on user-friendly design and responsive interfaces. The website includes a product catalog feature that directly connects to Shopee.

mapala.title: P.A.S Mahaguru Website (Bootcamp Assignment)
mapala.description: This is a simple website project I developed as part of a bootcamp assignment. The website is designed to deliver an intuitive user experience and fulfill the objectives outlined during the course.

footer: Designed and Built by Miqdad Fauzan Ghozwatulhaq
